message: Let's make a deal Bob, this offer is better for you now than it will be later!
Let's be fair Alice, I'm sure we can find a compromise.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a good deal for both of us!
Alice, my offer is generous.  Let's end this before inflation eats away at the value!
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
Alice, it's my last offer.  Take this offer, or we both get nothing!
